name: CyberPunch!!!
description:
Designed for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. In this game, you coach the bionic boxer Jimbotron, using robotic parts to give yourself what little edge you can! May the best bionic boxer win!

Programming: Ben Wurth, Sam Wurth
Art: Andrew Clancy, Sam Wurth
Music: Cameron Smith
Project Design: Jacob Wurth, Rich Smith
